Class AbstractLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Draggable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlaceLabel, TransitionLabel

    public abstract class AbstractLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements Draggable
    Abstract class defining essential properties for each label component.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
